title: [GAMEPLAY] Prestigious Leblanc chroma (dark blue)
body:
Just got into a bot game and played with the dark blue chroma on prestigious Leblanc skin. Turns out it uses the old coloring that didn't go live when the chromas were released. I have played with this chroma before and it had the correct coloring but as of the latest patch the colors have changed (for the worse).

http://imgur.com/a/CiGD0

Dunno if skin visual bugs should be classified with [GAMEPLAY] but w/e...

replies.body:
Hi! 

Thanks for the report! In the future, this wouldn't be tagged under gameplay, as it isn't gameplay impacting. Your best label would be something along the lines of, 'Visual bug', or 'Skins bug'. 

Lemme dig into this today, as I'm not sure which is the correct option. 

**EDIT:** The store asset is correct, and we're working to pop the correct texture back into the build. This is something you'll see for patch 7.7. Sorry for the bug. We figured out what happened (a file was overwritten), and we've taken steps to prevent this from occurring the future. ;_; Thanks for your patience! <3
